amendment.description: To strike the highway stormwater discharge mitigation program.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2502 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2502 proposed by Senator Bond to Amendment SA 2285. (consideration: CR S1233-1234; text: CR S1233) To strike the highway stormwater discharge mitigation program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2502 proposed by Senator Bond to Amendment SA 2285.
